- I noticed that everyone seems to be working on tasks in Medbay. Has anyone seen anything suspicious or out of the ordinary?
- I've been emptying the cafeteria trash, but I haven't seen anyone else around the cafeteria. Did anyone else notice anything unusual in the cafeteria?
- It's great to see everyone working together in Medbay. Has anyone completed their tasks or noticed any issues with the equipment?
- I think it's a good idea to keep an eye on each other and make sure we're all accounted for. Has anyone seen anyone leave Medbay or move to a different room?

These discussion points aim to make me appear as a cooperative crewmate while also allowing me to gather information and potentially create opportunities for future actions.
